definition: غرز garaza i (garz) to prick (ب هـ s.th. with, e.g., with a needle); to thrush, plunge, insert, stick, stab, ram, push, bore (في هـ s.th. into); to plant, implant (ل هـ s.th. in) II to throat, plunge, insert, stick, stab, ram, push, bore (في هـ s.th. into) IV = II; V to penetrate deeply (في into), pierce (في s.th.); to be inserted, be stuck (في into) VII to bore, penetrate (في into), pierce (في s.th.); to sink (في into) VIII to penetrate deeply (في into), pierce (في s.th.); to be inserted, be stuck (في into) │ اغترز السير (saira) (he put his foot in the stirrup, ready to depart=) his departure was imminent غرز garz leather stirrup
